I feel bad for some people who come visit. For things like Mayfest and Mule Day
They see our weird and act like it‚Äôs a foreign country
Mule Day! Like a day to celebrate Mules and all things Muley ?
Well, to me it is a foreign country :ctwokinds-clovischuckle:
But it‚Äôs mainly a bunch of vendors selling things like personalized belts, Knick knacks, toys, and food
It‚Äôs where I got my flashlight stun gun
Bunch of football themed stuff tho
And some border on the side of mini swords

There is a kiosk seller in our local mall that sells both decorative and practical swords and knives. I admit to admiring them every time I pass. I don‚Äôt have the money to buy right now though. I want a decorative piece with a nice Damascus
And there‚Äôs an old timy car show. Perfect for pin up inspiration if you want to study an old model car
The fast food company I work for is known for having car shows like that.
People bring out their horses and wagons too
Sounds like some of the stuff that happens out here. (I must admit that I prefer eastern celebrations to the ones here)
They do a pretty good job of keeping the horses to where there‚Äôs no incidents. We did have one year that a young male had an issue with being too close to an older male though
We‚Äôre happily ‚Äúlove is in the air‚Äù accident free though

I‚Äôve never seen anything happen with horses at anything here. I suppose the handlers are pretty good. If the way my friends handle horses is any indication I don‚Äôt expect anything too out of control to happen.
The stallion that started getting upset looked too young to be out. He was broken but still had the ‚ÄúI‚Äôm alpha‚Äù hormones real bad
Ohhhh! XD typical young man then?
Pretty horse. He just was a young whipper snapper
The older horse he was so mad about was only agitated when he got close. Otherwise he just looked like ‚Äúugh. Teenagers.‚Äù

I‚Äôm not horribly knowledgeable about horses unfortunately. They were not part of my life back east. I do however learn something new every time I see my twin friends. They grew up on a farm doing all that cowgirl stuff.
Yup, old guy has seen it all before XD
My friend recently got her third horse. Her first is a young stallion she wants to turn into a gelding
Think the other two are girls
Had to google pinto to see if I was thinking of the right horses. I was. Whent camping with the twins once...we loaded up the horses...my second time handling a horse on my own...scared shitless XD
I‚Äôm not a horse person but I know a good bit about them. I don‚Äôt do heights though so if I‚Äôm gonna be on a horse, I‚Äôll use a saddle or ride with someone
I‚Äôm willing to do it again. Leaned a lot that weekend...like don‚Äôt startle you horse with your screams of ‚ÄúIM GONNA FALL!‚Äù . I went home with the worst bruises and sunburn of my life.
My uncle had horses before he died. One was the calmest thing you‚Äôd ever seen. Unless you were going to set yourself on fire on her back, she gave negative fecks
I‚Äôve got to go gather my stuff for class. I‚Äôll be back later. See ya Kiwi, Tom!
